abstract  WriterContext HCatWriter.prepareWrite()

static HCatWriter DataTransferFactory.getHCatWriter(WriterContext cntxt, StateProvider sp)
          This should be called at slave nodes to obtain an instance of HCatWriter If external system has some mechanism for providing state to HCatalog, this constructor can be used.
